pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model-Free Estimation of a Psychometric Function // Local linear estimation of psychometric functions. Provides functions for nonparametric estimation of a psychometric function and for estimation of a derived threshold and slope, and their standard deviations and confidence intervals.For more details see Zychaluk and Foster (2009) doi:10.3758/APP.71.6.1414 and Foster and Zychaluk (2007) doi:10.1109/MSP.2007.4286564.
